label: 繧繝
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 57th  . Nara National Museum . 2005
説明文: Also, ungen zaishiki. Color gradation. Ungen consists of clearly demarked bands of progressively lighter shades of color placed next to each other. Often several colors appear in together gradated shades. [繧繝彩色]
